title: Build story creation and sharing platform with AI generation and text-to-speech

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for stories that includes fields for title, content, author, genre (love, horror, fantasy, romance, thriller, science fiction, historical), creation date, and whether it is AI-generated or user-created

quotes: a website where i can make lots of stories
ai stories like love ,horrer Fantasy, Romance, Thriller, Science Fiction, Historical

acceptanceCriteria: Story data structure supports all specified genres
Stories can be marked as AI-generated or user-created
Each story has a unique identifier, title, content, author, genre, and timestamp

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to create, retrieve, list, and filter stories by genre
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create and save new stories
Stories can be retrieved by ID
Stories can be listed and filtered by genre
Both AI-generated and user-created stories are accessible

requirements.text: Generate a collection of AI-generated sample stories for each genre (love, horror, fantasy, romance, thriller, science fiction, historical) and seed them in the backend on initialization

quotes: their is already generated storys with ai stories like love ,horrer Fantasy, Romance, Thriller, Science Fiction, Historical

acceptanceCriteria: At least one sample story exists for each of the seven genres
Sample stories are pre-populated when the application initializes
Each sample story has appropriate genre-specific content

requirements.text: Create a frontend story browsing interface that displays all stories organized by genre with navigation between genres

quotes: ai stories like love ,horrer Fantasy, Romance, Thriller, Science Fiction, Historical

acceptanceCriteria: Users can browse stories by selecting different genres
All seven genres are clearly displayed and accessible
Story titles and basic metadata are visible in the browse view

requirements.text: Build a story creation form where users can write and publish new stories with title, content, and genre selection

quotes: i can make lots of stories

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes fields for title, content, and genre dropdown
Users can submit and save new stories
Newly created stories appear in the story list immediately after publishing

requirements.text: Implement a story reading view that displays the full story content with a text-to-speech feature that reads the story aloud using browser speech synthesis

quotes: that story can lision also ai is spiking thst storys

acceptanceCriteria: Users can click on a story to view its full content
A play/pause button controls text-to-speech playback
The browser's speech synthesis API reads the story content aloud
Playback can be stopped and restarted

requirements.text: Design a visually engaging and immersive interface with a literary or storytelling theme that uses warm, inviting colors and typography suitable for a reading experience
acceptanceCriteria: The design evokes a literary or storytelling atmosphere
Typography is optimized for comfortable reading
Color scheme is warm and inviting, avoiding default blue and purple
Layout clearly separates browsing, reading, and creation experiences

constraints: Use only browser-based text-to-speech (Web Speech API) for reading stories aloud
Do not integrate external AI services or LLM APIs for story generation
Generate sample AI stories as static content during backend initialization
nonGoals: Integration with external AI services like OpenAI or Anthropic
Advanced text-to-speech with voice selection or speed controls
